summary: After botanist Wilfred Glendon travels to Tibet in search of a rare flower, the Mariphasa, he returns to a London haunted by murders that can only be the work of bloodthirsty werewolves.
cast: Henry Hull|Warner Oland|Valerie Hobson|Lester Matthews|Lawrence Grant|Spring Byington|Clark Williams|J.M. Kerrigan|Charlotte Granville|Ethel Griffies|Zeffie Tilbury|Jeanne Bartlett|Reginald Barlow|Egon Brecher|Wong Chung|J. Gunnis Davis|Herbert Evans|Eole Galli|Dick Gordon|Helena Grant|Jeffrey Hassel|Boyd Irwin|Noel Kennedy|George Kirby|Connie Leon|Maude Leslie|James May|William Millman|Edmund Mortimer|Roseollo Navello|Amber Norman|Joseph North|Tempe Pigott|Harry Stubbs|David Thursby|Louis Vincenot|Beal Wong
title: El lobo humano
